query.description: (string) Sensor name. Full match, case sensitive.
(string) Sensor type. Allowed values: temperature, relativeHumidity, pressure, co2, motion, occupancy, presence, water
(string) Sensor external unique ID. Full match, case sensitive.
(string) Sensor status. Allowed values: Online, Offline, Unavailable
(string) Comma separated list of fields to be returned. Allowed values: _id, type, externalId, name, description, resourceIds, status, distributor, minRange, maxRange, displayUnitCode, displayUnit

urlencoded.description: (string) Sensor type; *mandatory. Allowed values: temperature, relativeHumidity, pressure, co2, motion, occupancy, presence, water
(string) Sensor status. Allowed values: Online, Offline, Unavailable. Default Online.
(string) Comma separated list of unique resource identifiers (Rooms._id) that sensor is attached to.
(number) Minimum sensor reading range considered as normal.
(number) Maximum sensor reading range considered as normal.
(string) Unit code (eg. C). Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.
(string) Measuring unit to be displayed (eg. Celsius). Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.
(string) Sensor type. Allowed values: temperature, relativeHumidity, pressure, co2, motion, occupancy, presence, water
(string) Sensor status. Allowed values: Online, Offline, Unavailable. Default Online.
(string) Comma separated list of unique resource identifiers (Rooms._id) that sensor is attached to.
(number) Minimum sensor reading range considered as normal.
(number) Maximum sensor reading range considered as normal.
(string) Unit code (eg. C). Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.
(string) Measuring unit to be displayed (eg. Celsius). Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.

query.description: (string) Sensor type. Allowed values: temperature, relativeHumidity, pressure, co2, motion, occupancy, presence, water
(string) Sensor unique ID (Sensors._id). Full match, case sensitive.
(string) Sensor external unique ID. Full match, case sensitive.
(string) Sensor status. Allowed values: Online, Offline, Unavailable
(string) Comma separated list of fields to be returned. Allowed values: _id, type, externalId, name, description, resourceIds, status, distributor, minRange, maxRange, displayUnitCode, displayUnit

urlencoded.description: (string) Sensor unique ID (Sensors._id). *sensorId or externalId must be provided
(string) Sensor external unique ID. *sensorId or externalId must be provided
(string) Sensor type; *must be provided if sensorId is omitted. Allowed values: temperature, relativeHumidity, pressure, co2, motion, occupancy, presence, water
(string) Comma separated list of unique resource identifiers (Rooms._id) that sensor is attached to. *must be provided if registration of the new sensor is needed.
(number) Minimum sensor reading range considered as normal.
(number) Maximum sensor reading range considered as normal.
(string) Unit code to be be used when showing values in the system (eg. C). Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.
(string) Unit to be used when showing values in the system (eg. Celsius). Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.
(string) Measurement unit code (eg. C). Unit used by the sensor. Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.
(string) Measurement unit (eg. Celsius). Unit used by the sensor. Allowed values depend on the sensor type. The default value is stored if omitted.

query.description: structureIds : Comma-separated list of structure IDs.Example: structureIds=122,1332,2434
fields (optional): Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Example: fields=address,name,structureId,logoId
(string) Date in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI:SS+00:00 format; default: current time;
(string) Date in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI:SS+00:00 format; default: end of the day;
